location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Camp Jeypore [Jaipur] to Colonel William Carnell

mods.abstract: Letter regarding dealing with the Meywar [Mewār] Thakoors (local nobles); Carnell's response regarding Asuf Khan and a strange case of a father asking his son to aid him in being buried alive.The letter also discusses the opening of the Railway line which will take place with festivities the next day; Lieutenant Yates' settlement work at Oodeypur [Udaipur] and Pelly's endeavours to reorganise the public works at Aboo [Ābu] and Sinoli division.
